feed.title: MARINKA ZITNIK
feed.subtitle: Machine Learning for Medicine and Science

entry.title: PrimeKG: Precision Medicine KG
entry.content: We created PrimeKG, a precision medicine-oriented knowledge graph that AI analyses of network medicine.
entry.summary: We created PrimeKG, a precision medicine-oriented knowledge graph that AI analyses of network medicine.

entry.title: Webster on the Cover of Cell Systems

link.title: Webster on the Cover of Cell Systems

entry.content: Webster is on the cover of April issue of Cell Systems. Webster uses cell viability changes following gene perturbation to automatically learn cellular functions and pathways from data.
entry.summary: Webster is on the cover of April issue of Cell Systems. Webster uses cell viability changes following gene perturbation to automatically learn cellular functions and pathways from data.

entry.title: NASA Space Biology
entry.content: Dr. Zitnik will serve on the Science Working Group at NASA Space Biology.
entry.summary: Dr. Zitnik will serve on the Science Working Group at NASA Space Biology.

entry.title: Yasha’s Graduate Research Fellowship
entry.content: Yasha won the National Defense Science and Engineering Graduate (NDSEG) Fellowship. Congratulations!
entry.summary: Yasha won the National Defense Science and Engineering Graduate (NDSEG) Fellowship. Congratulations!

entry.title: AI4Science at ICML 2022
entry.content: We are excited to be selected to organize the AI4Science meeting at ICML 2022. Stay tuned for details. http://www.ai4science.net/icml22
entry.summary: We are excited to be selected to organize the AI4Science meeting at ICML 2022. Stay tuned for details. http://www.ai4science.net/icml22

entry.title: Graph Algorithms in Biomedicine at PSB 2023

link.title: Graph Algorithms in Biomedicine at PSB 2023

entry.content: Excited to be organizing a session on Graph Algorithms at PSB 2023. Stay tuned for details.
entry.summary: Excited to be organizing a session on Graph Algorithms at PSB 2023. Stay tuned for details.

entry.title: Multimodal Learning on Graphs
entry.content: New preprint! We introduce REMAP, a multimodal AI approach for disease relation extraction and classification. Project website.
entry.summary: New preprint! We introduce REMAP, a multimodal AI approach for disease relation extraction and classification. Project website.

entry.title: Explainable Graph AI on the Capitol Hill

link.title: Explainable Graph AI on the Capitol Hill

entry.content: Owen has been selected to present our research on explainable biomedical AI to members of the US Congress at the “Posters on the Hill” symposium. Congrats Owen!
entry.summary: Owen has been selected to present our research on explainable biomedical AI to members of the US Congress at the “Posters on the Hill” symposium. Congrats Owen!

entry.title: Graph Neural Networks for Time Series

link.title: Graph Neural Networks for Time Series

entry.content: Hot off the press at ICLR 2022. Check out Raindrop, our graph neural network with unique predictive capability to learn from irregular time series. Project website.
entry.summary: Hot off the press at ICLR 2022. Check out Raindrop, our graph neural network with unique predictive capability to learn from irregular time series. Project website.

entry.title: Biomedical Graph ML Tutorial Accepted to ISMB

link.title: Biomedical Graph ML Tutorial Accepted to ISMB

entry.content: Excited to present a tutorial at ISMB 2022 on graph representation learning for precision medicine. Congratulations, Michelle!
entry.summary: Excited to present a tutorial at ISMB 2022 on graph representation learning for precision medicine. Congratulations, Michelle!
